rows.label: qst100801_msg0001
rows.name:
Well, hello... You seem like
experienced travelers.

rows.label: qst100801_msg0003
rows.name:
I'm sorry for the sudden
intrusion... My name is Kapha,
and I travel from place to place.

rows.label: qst100801_msg0004
rows.name:
A doctor in Gula asked me to fetch
some Healing Herb, and I was looking
for it with my partner, Shal.

rows.label: qst100801_msg0005
rows.name:
But we're both new to Gula,
and we couldn't find where
the herb grows...

rows.label: qst100801_msg0006
rows.name:
We split up to search, and Shal
ended up all the way over there...

rows.label: qst100801_msg0007
rows.name:
I've been calling out to
her from here, but it seems
she can't hear me...

rows.label: qst100801_msg0008
rows.name:
And, embarrassingly enough, I'm not
good at navigating high places...

rows.label: qst100801_msg0009
rows.name:
I don't know how long it would take
me to get there... and she might
move away again in that time.

rows.label: qst100801_msg0010
rows.name: Really? That would be a great help!

rows.label: qst100801_msg0011
rows.name:
I can see Shal from here, so if
she moves, I'll let you know.

rows.label: qst100801_msg0012
rows.name:
Honestly... She's not good at
fighting, but she just keeps going...

rows.label: qst100801_msg0015
rows.name:
When you catch up to Shal,
please tell her to come back
here. I'm counting on you.
